      Pizza class which inherits from SuperItem used to create Pizza objects

      class  SuperItem

      Methods in uk.ac.aber.dcs.cs12420.aberpizza.data with parameters of type Item 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Order.addItem(Item item, int quantity)
      calls the updateItemQuantity method.
      void OrderItem.setItem(Item item)
      set's the Item for this OrderItem
      boolean Order.updateItemQuantity(Item item, int quantity)
      loops through the ArrayList of OrderItems, and checks if the input-item already exists inside the list if yes it add 1 to the quantity each time this method is called
